mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(m1.pro_mem_no) AS count FROM pro_mem m1 INNER JOIN (SELECT pro_no FROM pro_mem WHERE id = #{id}) m2 ON m1.pro_no = m2.pro_no WHERE pro_parti_check = 'Y' AND m1.pro_no = #{proNo} GROUP BY m1.pro_no
SELECT i.name, m.id FROM pro_mem m JOIN users u ON(m.id = u.id) JOIN user_info i ON(u.emp_no = i.emp_no) WHERE m.pro_no = #{proNo} ORDER BY i.name
SELECT work_group_no, work_group_name, work_group_seq, pro_no FROM work_group WHERE pro_no = #{proNo} ORDER BY work_group_name
